com.netflix.genie.server.services.impl.jpa

Class ApplicationConfigServiceJPAImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.genie.server.services.impl.jpa.ApplicationConfigServiceJPAImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ApplicationConfigService

    @Named
 @Transactional(rollbackFor=com.netflix.genie.common.exceptions.GenieException.class)
public class ApplicationConfigServiceJPAImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ApplicationConfigService
    OpenJPA based implementation of the ApplicationConfigService.

      • getApplications

        @Transactional(readOnly=true)
public java.util.List<com.netflix.genie.common.model.Application> getApplications(java.lang.String name,
                                                                                                                java.lang.String userName,
                                                                                                                java.util.Set<com.netflix.genie.common.model.ApplicationStatus> statuses,
                                                                                                                java.util.Set<java.lang.String> tags,
                                                                                                                int page,
                                                                                                                int limit)
        Get applications for given filter criteria.
        Specified by:
        getApplications in interface ApplicationConfigService
        Parameters:
        name - name of application. Can be null or empty.
        userName - The user who created the application. Can be null/empty
        statuses - The statuses of the applications to find. Can be null.
        tags - tags allocated to this application
        page - Page number to start results on
        limit - Max number of results per page
        Returns:
        successful response, or one with HTTP error code
